resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105940</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105940</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206317</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching With Documents: Lesson Plans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht Mit Dokumenten: Lektion-Pläne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignement Avec des Documents : Plans de 
Leçon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensino Com Originais: Plantas Da Lição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnamento Con I Documenti: Programmi Di 
Lezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία με τα έγγραφα: Σχέδια μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñanza Con Los Documentos: Planes De la 
Lección</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features instructional materials to help students analyze historical documents and events such as the U.S. Constitution, the launching of the U.S. Navy, and the fight for equal rights during the Civil War.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Merkmale Unterrichtsmaterialien, zum der 
Kursteilnehmer zu helfen, historische Dokumente und Fälle wie die 
VEREINIGTE STAATEN Beschaffenheit, das Ausstoßen der VEREINIGTE 
STAATEN Marine und der Kampf für gleiche Rechte während des 
Bürgerkrieges zu analysieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel didactique de dispositifs pour aider des
étudiants à analyser les documents et les événements historiques 
tels que la constitution des ETATS-UNIS, le lancement de la marine des
ETATS-UNIS, et le lutter pour des droits égaux pendant la guerre 
civile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">materiais instrutivos das características para 
ajudar a estudantes analisar originais e eventos históricos tais como
o constitution de ESTADOS UNIDOS, lançar-se da marinha de ESTADOS 
UNIDOS, e a luta para direitas iguais durante a guerra civil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiale didattico delle caratteristiche per 
aiutare gli allievi ad analizzare i documenti e gli eventi storici 
quali la costituzione degli STATI UNITI, il lancio del blu marino 
degli STATI UNITI e la lotta per i diritti uguali durante la guerra 
civile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικά υλικά χαρακτηριστικών γνωρισμάτων για να 
βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές να αναλύσουν τα ιστορικά έγγραφα και τα 
γεγονότα όπως το ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟ σύνταγμα, η προώθηση του ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟΥ
ναυτικού, και η πάλη για τα ίσα δικαιώματα κατά τη διάρκεια του 
εμφύλιου πολέμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">materiales de instrucción de las características
para ayudar a estudiantes a analizar documentos y acontecimientos 
históricos tales como la constitución de ESTADOS UNIDOS, lanzar de 
la Marina de guerra de ESTADOS UNIDOS, y la lucha para las derechas iguales 
durante la guerra civil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206317</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105940</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/teaching-with-documents-lesson-plans</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
